about_the_game:
We need to destroy Mahmut, who started the zombie epidemic, and we go through various ways to destroy him. Various zombies and islands are waiting for us, we return to our island after destroying Mahmut.

10 DIFFERENT ISLANDSThe game world with 10 maps offers you many areas to explore. More than 10 regions are waiting to be discovered.

WEAPONS
Find weapons like pistols, rifles to protect yourself from bloodthirsty zombies.

HUN OR FISH
Food for milk, health kit etc. Avoid falling into the trap of various types of zombies. Also, use hints to collect keys to advance to other levels.

FIRST PERSON
There is also a camera angle in the game: First-person

DISCOVER EVERYWHEREExplore the world and collect food and ammo to help you survive.


3x100 BLOODYou only have 3X100 health, but you can increase your health. But if you run out of health, the checkpoint will be canceled and you will be back to the beginning.
detailed_description:
We need to destroy Mahmut, who started the zombie epidemic, and we go through various ways to destroy him. Various zombies and islands are waiting for us, we return to our island after destroying Mahmut.

10 DIFFERENT ISLANDSThe game world with 10 maps offers you many areas to explore. More than 10 regions are waiting to be discovered.

WEAPONS
Find weapons like pistols, rifles to protect yourself from bloodthirsty zombies.

HUN OR FISH
Food for milk, health kit etc. Avoid falling into the trap of various types of zombies. Also, use hints to collect keys to advance to other levels.

FIRST PERSON
There is also a camera angle in the game: First-person

DISCOVER EVERYWHEREExplore the world and collect food and ammo to help you survive.


3x100 BLOODYou only have 3X100 health, but you can increase your health. But if you run out of health, the checkpoint will be canceled and you will be back to the beginning.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 (Intel), Athlon 200 GE (AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 ya da AMD Radeon R5 200
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 ya da AMD Radeon R5 200
